properties.entry: INSERT INTO TMP_REC_CNT_LIBRES_ARQ_REC_EXT (ORD_ID,CNT_ID,PER_ID,ARQ_ID,OFI_ID,MOV_RIESGO,PER_NOMBRE,PER_APELLIDO1,PER_APELLIDO2,DD_TIN_CODIGO,CPE_ORDEN,RCF_DD_AER_CODIGO,CNT_PER_ARRASTRE) WITH CNT_EXC AS ( select /*+ MATERIALIZE */ distinct cnt_id from BATCH_DATOS_EXCEPTUADOS where cnt_id is not null ), CNT_LIBRES AS ( select /*+ MATERIALIZE */lib.cnt_id, lib.per_id, lib.arq_id, cnt.ofi_id, lib.mov_riesgo, PER.PER_NOMBRE, PER.PER_APELLIDO1, PER.PER_APELLIDO2, cpe.cnt_per_tin, cpe.cnt_per_oin, conf.rcf_dd_aer_codigo dd_aer_codigo,rcf_esc_prioridad, CPE.CNT_PER_ARRASTRE from TMP_REC_CNT_LIBRES_ARQ_REC lib join batch_datos_cnt cnt on lib.cnt_id = cnt.cnt_id join batch_datos_cnt_per cpe on lib.cnt_id = cpe.cnt_id and lib.per_id = cpe.per_id join batch_datos_per per on lib.per_id = per.per_id join BATCH_RCF_ENTRADA conf on conf.RCF_DD_EES_CODIGO = 'LBR' and conf.RCF_ESQ_BORRADO = 0 and lib.arq_id = conf.rcf_car_id where lib.cnt_id not in (select CNT_ID FROM CNT_EXC) ), DIST AS ( select /*+ MATERIAIZE */ distinct * from CNT_LIBRES ), DATOS as ( SELECT /*+ MATERIALIZE */ * FROM DIST order by rcf_esc_prioridad, mov_riesgo desc ) select rownum, d.cnt_id, d.per_id, d.arq_id, d.ofi_id, d.mov_riesgo, d.per_nombre, d.per_apellido1, d.per_apellido2, d.cnt_per_tin, d.cnt_per_oin, d.dd_aer_codigo, d.cnt_per_arrastre from DATOS d

INSERT INTO TMP_PER_FILTRADAS SELECT DISTINCT PER_ID FROM ( SELECT TMP.PER_ID FROM TMP_PER_ARQUETIPO TMP INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT RCF_CAR_ID, RCF_DD_TCE_CODIGO FROM BATCH_RCF_ENTRADA WHERE RCF_DD_EES_CODIGO = 'LBR') RCFE ON TMP.ARQ_ID = RCFE.RCF_CAR_ID WHERE RCFE.RCF_DD_TCE_CODIGO = 'FIL' UNION SELECT PER_ID FROM BATCH_DATOS_EXCEPTUADOS WHERE PER_ID IS NOT NULL )

INSERT INTO TMP_CNT_PER_VALIDAS (CNT_ID, PER_ID, CNT_PER_TIN, CNT_PER_OIN, CNT_PER_ARRASTRE) SELECT DISTINCT CPE.CNT_ID, CPE.PER_ID, CPE.CNT_PER_TIN, CPE.CNT_PER_OIN, CPE.CNT_PER_ARRASTRE FROM BATCH_DATOS_CNT_PER CPE LEFT JOIN BATCH_DATOS_EXCEPTUADOS EXC ON CPE.CNT_ID = EXC.CNT_ID LEFT JOIN TMP_PER_FILTRADAS PF ON CPE.PER_ID = PF.PER_ID WHERE EXC.EXC_ID IS NULL AND PF.PER_ID IS NULL
